visual_dna.palette: Rich red (#D32F2F) 70%, white (#FFFFFF) 20%, subtle dark accents
visual_dna.lighting: Studio lighting highlighting texture and condensation

strategic_analysis.audience: Coke enthusiasts, event watchers, broad age range

image_composition_analysis.focal_points: Central product focus with equal emphasis on text, ensuring brand recall
image_composition_analysis.typography_style: Bold sans-serif and script, contrasting for emphasis

source_analysis.prompt_reconstruction: Studio shot of a classic Coke bottle with condensation, centered on a rich red background, bold white text to the sides, iconic and timeless style, commercial advertisement context --ar 16:9 --style classic

transformation_instructions: replace the coke bottle with pepsi, changing the text and background colours as well
